pullRequest.title: HBASE-25267 Add SSL keystore type and truststore related configs for HBase RESTServer
pullRequest.bodyText:
In this patch I introduced the following new parameters:
hbase.rest.ssl.keystore.type
hbase.rest.ssl.truststore.store
hbase.rest.ssl.truststore.password
hbase.rest.ssl.truststore.type
If any of the new the parameter is not provided, then we are falling-back to the current behaviour (e.g. assuming JKS keystore/truststore types, or no passwords, or no custom trust store file).
I also created a new test case to test the RESTServer with SSL in general and also to test some keystore formats. To be able to write this test I also had to extend the client and keystore utilities we use for testing.

commit.message:
HBASE-25267 Make SSL keystore type configurable in HBase RESTServer

In this patch I want to introduce the hbase.rest.ssl.keystore.type parameter,
enabling us to customize the keystore type for the REST server. If the
parameter is not provided, then we should fall-back to the current behaviour
(which assumes keystore type JKS).

This is similar to how we already configure the InfoServer objects with the
ssl.server.keystore.type parameter to set up HTTPS for the various admin UIs.
HBASE-25267 add truststore parameters and unit test
HBASE-25267 fix failing unit test and spotbugs error
